featured.text: MOOCs first made waves in the fall of 2011, when Professor Sebastian Thrun from Stanford University opened his graduate-level artificial intelligence course up to any student anywhere, and 160,000 students in more than 190 countries signed up.

definition.zh_def: 史丹佛：位於美國加利福尼亞州的一所著名大學，以其學術卓越和創新研究而聞名。
definition.en_def: Stanford: A prestigious university located in California, known for its academic excellence and innovative research.
definition.example: She decided to apply to Stanford for her graduate studies.
